name: GangWar Crime City
description:
GangWar Crime City

GangWar Crime City is action-adventure game. This open world game story evolves around the crime city and underworld mafia, killing and shooting with immersive 3D action and real simulation of street fight.

The best criminal game! Here you can find endless mission about how to conquer the world of mafia.

it’s time to get back to your crime city and get ready to build your own crime to survive in this dangerous neighborhood.

Are your ready for great criminal adventure? Be ready to rob,kill,shoot and fight!
The gangster unlawful act town is full with gangsters, street thugs, mafia lords and godfather.

A city in total war, with City crime. Tall buildings surround you leading to the possibility of snipers that target you with its laser sight of their long-range rifles, are in the spotlight.

You are provided the unique opportunity to become a super villain. You were once the offence lord of Miami, Russia and many other crime city.

Game Features :

=> Unique Gangsters Stories
=> Incredible 3D graphics and intuitive touch controls
=> Realistic city environment with HD graphics & exciting sound effects
=> The most realistic city crime simulator 3d game
=> Real life weapons and gangster cars
